snippet: The Old Stone House museum in Park Slope is dedicated to the history of the Revolutionary War’s bloody Battle of Brooklyn.
abstract: Two Good Reasons column profiles Old Stone House in Park Slope, museum dedicated to history of Revolutionary War's Battle of Brooklyn; museum is near family-run restaurant Colombia In Park Slope.
lead_paragraph: The Old Stone House museum in Park Slope is dedicated to the history of the Revolutionary War’s bloody Battle of Brooklyn.

headline.main: Where George Washington Lost a Battle in Brooklyn, a Museum Dedicated to Its History Sits
